entry.title: Versace Bright Crystal by Versace for Women - 3 Pc Gift Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Gift Set
Price: 76.95

The Versace Bright Crystal line was launched by the Versace design house in 2006. The gift set is the perfect present for the confident woman who likes to pamper herself in luxury. The delicate pomegranate is followed by a lovely floral heart accord of peony, magnolia and lotus flower, and a lingering note of sensual musk and amber. Recommended for daily wear.

entry.title: Dylan Turquoise Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 70.95 - 90.95 (3 variants)

Launched by the design house of Versace in the year 2020. Described as sensual, youthful and fresh, the new Dylan Turquoise is created by perfumer Sophie Labbe. Top notes- mandarin, primofiore lemon, pink pepper. Base cedar, musk, Clearwood.

entry.title: Eros Eau De Parfum Spray For Men By Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 78.95 - 116.95 (4 variants)

Experience the captivating allure of Eros Eau de Parfum Spray for Men by Versace. This fragrance encapsulates the essence of masculinity and seduction, leaving a lasting impression wherever you journey. Its invigorating composition unfolds with vibrant bursts of fresh mint, crisp apple, and zesty lemon, infusing a refreshing and energizing aura. The heart reveals a harmonious fusion of warm spices, including tonka bean and geranium, evoking depth and sensuality. As the fragrance lingers, it unveils rich and seductive notes of vanilla, cedarwood, and vetiver, creating a sophisticated and irresistible allure. Eros Eau de Parfum is a symbol of confidence and magnetism, making it an exquisite choice for the modern man.

entry.title: Versense Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 49.95 - 65.95 (2 variants)

Launched in 2009 by the Italian haute couture design house Versace, Versense for Women is a reflection of the modern, take-charge women who is confident in her skin and beautiful in her sexuality. It packs the fragrance of a rather rare floral bouquet that radiates energy and freshness. The natural tones create a green aura, which smells like freedom, dynamism and a balance of your inner self with the surrounding nature. In-line with the overall theme, the Flacon of Versense is colored light-green as well. Perfect for regular-use by the modern, free-spirited fashionable woman.

entry.title: Versace Woman Eau de Parfum Spray for Women by Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 38.99 - 51.95 (2 variants)

The bold exuberance of the Versace woman is bottled in the Versace Woman Eau de Parfum from the international design house. The intense oriental scent of the padparadscha lotus; the bouquet of jasmine, wild rose, bergamot and frangipani leaves; and the robust fruitness of plum and raspberry make this a perfume that is for the confident woman who is comfortable in her own skin and isn't afraid of attention.

Launched by the design house of Versace in the year 2004. This floral fragrance has a blend of gardenia, orange blossom, amber and musk. It is recommended for casual wear.

entry.title: Dylan Blue Pour Femme For Women By Gianni Versace Eau De Parfum Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Parfum
Price: 81.95 - 103.95 (2 variants)

Dylan Blue for women from Versace boasts of floral, woody, and fruity notes that result in delivering one of the most balanced fragrances out there in the market today. Each note level signifies a particular attribute. The top represents strength, while the middle and the bases represent sensuality and elegance, respectively. The nose behind this stunning fragrance is Calice Becker, who claims that Dylan Blue is her attempt at celebrating the feminine. It is all about power, strength and refinement.

entry.title: Crystal Noir For Women By Gianni Versace Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 53.95 - 86.95 (4 variants)

Established design house Gianni Versace unveiled the Crystal Noir fragrance in 2004, with its favorite gardenia notes taking centerstage. Crystal Noir fuses fresh sweet gardenia and peonies with warm spices, and a settling note of sensuous musk to bring you elegance in a bottle. Best-suited for evening events and special occasions.

entry.title: Yellow Diamond For Women By Gianni Versace Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau De Toilette Spray
Price: 53.95 - 120.95 (4 variants)

Launched in 2011 by premium Italian haute couture label Versace, Yellow Diamond for women is pure perfection. It opens with sensuous, juicy notes that reveal a floral heart or orange flowers and mimosa. dry down is lush musk. Everything related to perfume, from its fragrance (pure, airy, floral, sparkling and feminine) to brand (Versace!), packaging (collector's edition yellow bottle inside a baroque ornament-decorated box) and face (supermodel Abbey Lee Kershaw) are just perfect!

entry.title: Red Jeans Eau de Toilette Spray for Women by Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 42.95

Designed for the young and carefree modern woman, the Red Jeans by Versace is infused with classic floral and fruity scents that lend it its rich and luxurious appeal. The fragrance features fruity peach and apricot, sweet flowery notes of rose and water lily at its heart and profound musk and vanilla.

entry.title: Man Eau Fraiche Eau de Toilette Spray for Men by Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 49.95 - 107.95 (5 variants)

Launched in 2007 by design house of Gianni Versace, Man Eau Fraiche is a lighter re-creation of original Versace for Men. It tones down spicy Latino vibe of original with use of White Lemon, Amber and other fresh scents, to create a distinctively Mediterranean aura. dry down is woody, giving it that classic masculine fragrance which we have come to associate Versace for Men with. Perfect as regular-use cologne for calm and composed fashionable man.

entry.title: Eros For Men By Gianni Versace Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 39.95 - 107.95 (5 variants)

Versace Eros cologne was launched in 2012. The fragrance starts with fresh citrus notes and then slips into subtle geranium, tank beans, and ambroxan notes, boosting the vanilla and woody notes of the scent as if a preview of what is to follow. It easily slips in with the lifestyle of the sophisticated man, making it wearable to work, play, or otherwise.

entry.title: Blue Jeans For Men By Gianni Versace Eau De Toilette Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Eau de Toilette
Price: 42.95

Launched in 1994 by the design house of Gianni Versace, Blue Jeans Cologne for Men has attained the status of a classic male scent, that never fails to impress. perfume opens with a tasteful scent that is part woody and part fruity. It then reveals a heart of spices and finally dries down to a warm, masculine tone. Besides, when you know that celebrity perfumer Jean-Pierre Bethouart is the nose behind Blue Jeans for Men, you already know it's going to be a classic! Perfect as regular wear for fashionable men of many moods.

entry.title: Dylan Blue Miniature Set for Women by Versace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Versace
Type: Gift Set
Price: 24.95

Versaces Dylan Blue Pour Femme Eau De Parfum is an intense women's fragrance best suited for evening wear and special occasions. The deep blue perfume bottle, inspired by the mysterious and captivating Mediterranean Sea, features golden details and the iconic Medusa image to symbolize the connection between the past and the present. Dylan Blue is a must-have Eau De Parfum in your perfume collection.

Mini Set includes: 0.17 oz. Eau de Toilette Spray, 0.8 oz. After Shave Balm and 0.8 Shower Gel

SCENT
  • Top Notes are Water Notes, Calabrian Bergamot, Grapefruit, Fig Leaf
  • Middle Notes are Violet Leaf, Papyrus, Patchouli, Black Pepper, Ambroxan
  • Base Notes are Musk, Incense, Tonka Bean, Saffron
